If you don't have Half-Life 2 yet, i'd reccomend that you'd get it now. Why?
I'll list the pros and cons:

Pros:
The graphics, even though they are from 2004, are still very good looking
The gameplay is very good, very challenging bosses
The story is pretty good, at least for just HL2 (It seems to get way bigger in Episode 2)
The vehicals are very fun to drive
Many parts of the game are very interactable (You can mess stuff up, move things around)
It's linear-ness makes it so you don't get too lost.
There is Ravenholm; who doesn't like killing zombies?

Cons:
It's sometimes too linear
The puzzles are sometimes very simple, but they are still somewhat fun

And the worst bit:

You can't just play Half-Life 2, you have to play Episode 1 and 2 afterwords, Which are all very good games, I'm not saying anything bad about them. The worst part is actually waiting for Half Life 3... and waiting... and waiting.

In the end, this game is 9.75/10. It is a great game, and I would definitly buy it again.

El que Half-Life 2 haya marcado un antes y un despues en aspectos graficos, fisicas, en fps y en muchos otros aspectos es muy creible... porque al dia de hoy "graficamente" no parece muy retro, la variedad de armas, imaginacion y cariño que le pusieron a cada una es algo que muchos fps de hoy deberian de tener en cuenta "el jugar con su propio juego".
Los fallos que tienen son minusculos ante gran obra... podria criticar la torpeza de los npc al no entender que queres cruzar por una puerta o que deben de ponerce en cubierto, los odiados puntos de carga y guardado automatico... pero como ya dije no es nada con todo lo que nos ofrece...
En fin, es trabajo de valve... comprencenlo de una vez.

Even all these years later there is still barely any games that come even close to what this game has achieved, I think it's safe to say that this game is an essential play at least once, and it's cheap even better it's on sale quite a lot so as long as you pick it up you should have fun.

I really really wish I still loved this game, but unfortunately I don't. This game definitely shows its age in the design which is extremely unfun and gimmicky at times. For example, [spoiler] in the chapter sandtraps, using the gravity gun to move objects around to get through the sand is extremely tedious.[/spoiler] Also, stacking puzzles are not fun and you can't tell me otherwise. There is nothing interesting about picking up a box and moving it to a spot where I need it to progress. The shooting is really just okay, but in general I kinda got bored in sections with a lot of enemies. In general, I actually think the weapons and shooting was a lot better in the first Half-Life actually. I really wish I enjoyed the game more and if you're looking at my reviews, you probably think I'm a Half-Life hater, but I really think that both Half-Life 1 and 2 are very flawed. At the end of the day, I still played through these games multiple times and they are a big part of my childhood, I just wish they were designed better.

剧情设计的也挺赞。
铁幕下的17号城市，一下火车就是巨大的显示屏播放着领导人的“欢迎”词。
“这不是一个有监狱的国家，而是一座有国家的监狱”
居民家里的电视机，街上的大屏幕都播放着同一个频道——领导人道貌岸然的洗脑演讲。
然后游戏的内容就是从一个逃犯混成反抗军领导者。
后来一个场景是几个反抗军拆除纪念碑上的大屏幕。不管你们的“恩主”怎样标榜自己的伟大光荣正确，它们的末日也终将来临。暴力机器的强大和谎言的欺骗或许能维持一时，却维持不了一世。
嗯反正就是觉的这款游戏还是比较meaningful而不仅仅是好玩，就写个评测吧。❤

[h1]Intro[/h1]
Half-Life 2 is the 2nd installment of the Half-Life series set approximately 20 years after the events of Half-Life 1. The first Half-Life has been said to be the best game ever so the sequel had gigantic expectations, and it delivered.

[h1]Story[/h1]
The story of Half-Life 2 is very rich. You are Gordon Freeman, a former Black Mesa employee who's been in a coma for 20 years under the control of the Gman, once you've woken up you try to reunite with the scientists who survived the events of Half-Life 1. Every character is unqiue and they have their own personalities. My favourite character being Barney Calhoun. I am also a big fan of Half-Life and Portal being in the same alternative universe.

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
The graphics in Half-Life 2 are outstanding for it's time, holds up great even for today's standards. Although the texture quality being a bit outdated, everything else is great. Shaders are nice, I'm a big fan of the reflections on floors, windows and on water, that technology is called cubemapping. Post-processing effects are cool, good use of sprites.

[h1]Controls and Movement[/h1]
The controls in Half-Life 2 have set the standard of good and simple controls. Segwaying in let's talk about the movement, the movement is an art form of it self, it reintroduced bunnyhopping, strafing and many more movement techniques. Bunnyhopping is still a big movement technique in today's games like CS:GO which uses the same game engine as Half-Life 2. I would really recommend you watching a speedrun of Half-Life 2 done by waezone on Games Done Quick.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8gWd5A_4eYQ

[h1]Official Soundtrack[/h1]
The Official SoundTrack of Half-Life 2 is my favourite music track from any other game ever, i personally love the industrial sounding instruments and sounds that are in this track. I love this soundtrack so much sometimes I listen to it when I'm going to sleep. My favourite song being Triage at Dawn, closely followed by Hazardous Environments.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
Half-Life 2 is for me the best game in the Half-Life series and also my favourite game of all time. Played it first 2 years ago as a very early easter gift, I still play this game to this day, but I mostly play Synergy (HL2 multiplayer mod) because it's more fun to play the Half-Life experience with other people and friends than with just yourself. If i had to rate this game out of then. I would rate it a deserving 10/10. Best game ever made. Thanks for reading and have a great day.

As you can see, I have put way too many hours into this game. I played it a while ago, and i decided to play it again, and again, and again for a third time! It is really fun, and gives you that chilling nostalgiac feel.

So I'm a late arrival to the Half-Life 2 train. As a die-hard fan of the Portal series, I figured I'd see what another of Valve's flagship games looks like. Started playing and never looked back, even after all these years, IMO this game measures up to any other FPS out there. The story is unique and engrossing, the characters are fun and memorable, and the mechanics of the game (read: gravity gun) run flawlessly. Not to mention the game still looks amazing even if you don't have a top-end system to run it on. I haven't finished it yet, but I'm very excited to do so and move on to both Episodes 1 and 2.
Highly recommended!

No había tocado la saga y vi que tenía los 2 en mi lista de juegos y dije: "Va, todo el mundo lo pone por las nubes, a ver qué tal está".

Pros:
 - La acción está genial. La velocidad en los combates y la variedad de enemigos (excepto por los soldados, que sólo cambian de uniforme) creo que está muy bien. 
 - La cantidad de armas que puedes usar también me parece estupenda (rara vez me he visto sin munición de nada).
 - Las fases de vehículos, en concreto, Peligro de Agua, me parece de lo mejor del juego. Se ve cómo muchos juegos modernos han bebido de este.
 - Puzzles marca de la casa. No muy complicados, pero ingeniosos.

Contras:
 - Entiendo que el juego tiene su edad y tal, pero...el doblaje...madre mía el doblaje xD Tenía fe en que sólo fueran dos personajes los que hablaban raro y lo dejé con audio español, pero menudo error. A falta de escucharlo en inglés, esto es imperdonable xD
 - La forma de contar la historia a trompicones, obligándote a quedarte junto a un TV random, e incluso en mitad de combates me ha perjudicado bastante porque acabé pasando de ella por completo.

He puesto positivo, pero es más parecido a un "5 condicional". Creo que los errores perjudican bastante, pero los pros te hacen pasar un buen rato jugando, que es lo importante, al fin y al cabo.
El mejor juego de la historia, punto y final.

This game holds my (and some of my family member's) greatest memories with singlplayer gaming. Its combination of puzzles, combat, strategy, all seem to fit together in the game. In my opinion its a timeless classic with a great engine for its time.

El legendario Half Life 2, después de 13 años lo volví a jugar y puedo decir sin problemas que sigue siendo el rey de los shooters. 
	HL2 nos cuenta una historia muy buena sin cinemáticas y eso es algo que no todos pueden hacer. Jamas perdemos el control de Gordon Freeman y por eso el juego nos introduce en su mundo con su ambientación. No necesitan decirnos que estamos en un mundo oprimido con autoritarismo, nos lo muestra mientra nos escapamos de la primer ciudad. Ni que a la resistencia le estaba yendo mal pero nuestra llegada tuerce la balanza, nos damos cuenta por los alientos de cada aliado que vayamos encontrando en el camino. Desde que arranca el juego hasta que termina es una montaña rusa de emociones que va cambiando para no atascarse en la monotonía. 
	El combate es rápido y fluido. Se dispara desde la cadera con una mira, no hay vida regenerativa y tenemos un arsenal muy variado que cada arma tiene una función especifica. Todo esto le da una modalidad de juego, que en los juegos modernos ya no existe. Saber cuando avanzar retirarse o escapar, así también como darnos cuenta que arma nos conviene en cada situación, puede cambiar drásticamente el resultado de las batallas. Y si lo juegan en una dificulta alta, el posicionamiento y cuidado de la munición son factores claves para sobrevivir. 

Compralo. ES UN JUEGAZO. Cuando está en oferta cuesta 1,50 US$.
Пожалуй одна из лучших игр за всю историю существования игр.

What is there to say about anything with the Valve or Half life franchise name behind it. They never disappoint and this is no exception as it has me sitting on the edge of my seat from the 1st scene of this amazing game. Although the graphics are a bit dated now you can't expect more from a game that was released in 2004. The game was beautiful for it's time and the gameplay and storyline makes it worth while.

It has a fun and creative storyline and don't forget damn intense, as are the new guns and enemies they introduced. All I can say is that you have to see for yourself. I recommend this game to anyone that has even the slightest bit of a gamer in them.

Buy Half Life 2, if you haven't been in the Solar System in the past 13 years.
13 has two digits
The first number with two digits in Arabic Numerals if you are going up on the scale from zero is 10
13 - 10 = 3
The third weapon you obtain in this is the SMG
SMG means SubMachineGun
Sub-stitution
A popular game with substitution of players is Football (soccer)
The most popular football game is FIFA
The most recent FIFA game is FIFA 17
FIFA is a worse horror game than the Ravenholm chapters of Half Life 2
FIFA has four letters and Ravenholm has nine.
9 - 4 = 5
The Orange Box contained five games
The Orange Box has three words in the title
5 - 3 = 2
I put more effort into this than into my English class
English is one word
2 + 1 = 3
There, you have the answers to your maths exams. You're welcome!

Ahhhhhh....Half-Life 2....Un des jeux,si ce n'est celui que j'ai le plus sécher. J'ai découvert ce jeux vers mes 9 ans et je ne me lasse pas de refaire une fois de plus l'intégrale de la série.J'ai beau eu de le refaire une cinquième fois, une dixième fois, une vingtième fois, ce jeu est la qualité par excellence.Vous pourrez vous imaginez des tas de choses à propos de l'énigmatique G-man, parcourir le jeu de long en large pour découvrir même le plus infime des détails, vénerer votre fidèle pied-de-biche qui vous accompagnera partout ou encore admirer le charisme incroyable du docteur Kleiner (lol), vous ne pourrez pas ne pas aimer. Vous pourrez evidemment vous lasser comme sur tout jeux, vous pouvez l'avoir plus-bas dans votre liste de jeux préféré que le numéro un, mais jamais vous ne pourrer déclarez "Ce jeu n'a aucun sens".

Je pense avoir tout expliquer,

Alors jouez, Cher joueur,Jouez...Sentez vous l'odeur de la qualité ?

Uma história fantástica, imersiva; personagens carismáticos e marcantes; ótimos gráficos (até hoje); level design e trilha sonora perfeitos, e, não da pra esquecer a fisica e a engine que são um show a parte - da pra perder alguns minutos jogando objetos nos combine ou arremessando eles com a gravity gun. Todos os adjetivos são poucos para tentar definir essa obra prima. 
Se tivesse que escolher um jogo pra categoria "Jogo Perfeito", um deles, com certeza, seria Half Life 2.
Meu jogo favorito, minha franquia favorita.

Agora nos resta esperar uma visita do G Man nos escritórios da Valve solicitando o Half Life 3.

Są takie gry, gdzie po pierwszej części można by powiedzieć: to koniec. Jednak nie dlatego, iż tytuł okazał się klapą. Bardziej przychodzi na myśl słowo: "pozamiatane". Baldur's Gate. Fallout. Wspomniany w tytule Half-Life. A jednak. Okazuje się, że powstaje część druga, przy której "pozamiatane" wzbudza jedynie nieco sarkastyczny uśmieszek na ustach. To, co Valve zaprezentowało w drugiej części Half-Life'a przeszło moje najśmielsze oczekiwania. Kompletnie nowy silnik graficzny. Nowy, wykreowany specjalnie pod potrzeby fabuły świat. Dodatkowi bohaterowie, zróżnicowana rozgrywka. Batalie z obcymi na otwartych terenach i spektakularne, jeżące włosy na karku bitwy z Kombinatem w City 17. Klimat post-apokalipsy, gdzie wraz z kosmitami niczym rzymski cesarz rządzi dyktator. Brak mi słów. Brak słów! Ta gra jest jedną z najlepszych, jakie kiedykolwiek stworzył nasz ludzki gatunek. Gra niemalże żywa, gdzie grając i walcząc odnosi się wrażenie, że po drugiej stronie nie ma maszyny, algorytmu, komputera, ale siedzą prawdziwi ludzie, którzy wcielając się w przeciwników kontrolują ich poczynania. Ponadto niewiarygodny, realny świat. Wszystkie obiekty dają wrażenie masy. Podnoszone skrzynki, przedmioty, pojazdy i przeciwnicy. Czuć masę. Czuć fizykę. Czuć autentyczność. Do tego świetna fabuła, spektakularna cytadela i starzy przyjaciele z Half Life. A na koniec Gordon Freeman i G-man. Jak dla mnie: "s%#$ up and take my money!".
